MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have isolated further supplies to carry out repairs to an underground cable fault between Newbattle Terrace and Eden Lane. Our team has managed to restore power to some customers and are still working to complete the repairs required. We now expect your supply to be restored by 4:00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:58pm on Thursday, 7th January 2021
